professional_experience_entries.title: System engineer
activities: Worldwide regulatory and industrial certification of positioning products
Planning and budget optimization of EMC, safety and performance testing activities in external laboratories
AE, R&D and management support for certification related topics
Liaison with certification and standartisation related organisations (REDCA, ETSI, C2CCC)
Software-defined radio development for HIL testing
Full stack development of internal databases
Tool development and automation for data analysis and test management
Devising specialized RF test setups for R&D studies

professional_experience_entries.title: International Graduate Program
activities: Galileo FOC Test User Receiver development
Migration of manual test procedures into Jenkins/Robot
Using a RFCS to simulate upcoming changes in the E1B/E5b INAV frame
DOORS requirements management and documentation of test results

professional_experience_entries.title: Technical Student
activities: FPGA programming and verification of the LHCb frontend electronics
HeRSCheL sub-detector expert: calibration and electronics maintenance
Shift leader for the LHCb detector: supervision and organisation
